Uses of Interface
edu.udo.cs.wvtool.generic.wordfilter.WVTWordFilter

Packages that use WVTWordFilter
edu.udo.cs.wvtool.external Contains individual classes by other people. 
edu.udo.cs.wvtool.generic.wordfilter Provides classes and interfaces for the filtering of words. 
 

Uses of WVTWordFilter in edu.udo.cs.wvtool.external
 

Classes in edu.udo.cs.wvtool.external that implement WVTWordFilter
 class StopwordsCzech
          Stopwords for the German language
 class StopwordsFrench
          Stopword Filter for french text documents.
 

Uses of WVTWordFilter in edu.udo.cs.wvtool.generic.wordfilter
 

Classes in edu.udo.cs.wvtool.generic.wordfilter that implement WVTWordFilter
 class AbstractStopWordFilter
          Abstract call implementing basic functionality for several word filters.
 class CombinedWordFilter
          A word filter that combines several word filters by disjunction.
 class DummyWordFilter
          Dummy Wrapper for the stop word class (without performing any filtering).
 class SelectingWordFilter
          Class that dynamically selects the word filter according to the selected language.
 class StopWordFilterFile
          Filters all words specified in a file.
 class StopWordsWrapper
          Wrapper for the stop word class.
 class StopWordsWrapperGerman
          A wrapper for the german stopwordlist
